text: you can use the API to manually move the CM, but yeah its a frustrating bug

I think a direct link to edit the content for GM (like when you can send a link to a template selecting a widget or a line in coded files) would be really useful to inject in the content editor for the marketers.
Something like:
<https://app.HubSpot.com/beta-design-manager/{{portalID}}/modules/{{moduleID}}#isEditingGlobalContent=true>
I managed to add a link on the content editor and open the design manager but need a full link to the content editor of a GM now :slightly_smiling_face:
Hi Jon! I'm opening an issue for my team for this, sorry for the added frustration there!
